code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import Marquee from"react-fast-marquee";import'./Skills.css';import{ThemeContext}from'../../contexts/ThemeContext';import{skillsData}from'../../data/skillsData';import{skillsImage}from'../../utils/skillsImage';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Skills(){const{theme}=useContext(ThemeContext);const skillBoxStyle={backgroundColor:theme.secondary,boxShadow:"0px 0px 30px ".concat(theme.primary30)};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills",style:{backgroundColor:theme.secondary},id:"skills",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skillsHeader",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:{color:theme.primary},children:"Skills"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skillsContainer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skill--scroll",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Marquee,{gradient:false,speed:80,pauseOnHover:true,pauseOnClick:true,delay:0,play:true,direction:"left",children:skillsData.map((skill,id)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skill--box",style:skillBoxStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:skillsImage(skill),alt:skill}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{color:theme.tertiary},children:skill})]},id))})})})]});}export default Skills;
